title: ‘CAPTION THIS’ CONTEST > Winner Announced!
content: MailChimp has announced a winner! @johnwilliams713 "This is the last time I model for your Etsy Shop, Lisa." Wanna know how cool the folks at MailChimp are? They're giving a SMASH Summit ticket to the joker who provides the funniest caption to the photo below: How it works: 1.        Post your caption in the comments section below. 2.        When the contest has ended, our friends at MailChimp will pick a winner. Simple as that. 3.        We’ll post the winner on our blog and notify the winner via e-mail to claim a ticket! 4.      The free ticket can be used for future events - so play along even if you can't attend SMASH!
